name: typescript-mcp
description: Use this skill when building MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers with TypeScript on Cloudflare Workers. This skill provides production-tested patterns for implementing tools, resources, and prompts using the official @modelcontextprotocol/sdk. This skill should be used when developers need stateless MCP serve
